signals.problem_statement: Desiree's team needs a way to track client communication sentiment to improve client retention.
signals.context: Desiree is exploring AI capabilities for tracking sentiment in client communications.

signals.problem_statement: The AI add-on is priced as a full package, which may not be cost-effective for all team members who won't use the features.
signals.context: Desiree's team has members who may not benefit from the AI features, making the $20 per user per month pricing a concern.

signals.problem_statement: Desiree's team requires a way to manage and review negative client interactions effectively.
signals.suggested_solution: Desiree mentioned tagging herself to review negative interactions.
signals.context: Desiree is looking for methods to ensure negative interactions are flagged for management review.
